summary:
Simple Batch Files to help get started.

open the console and then type in the names.

playerstatmax- uses the player.advskill command to adv every skill to 100
playerstatovermax-uses player.forceav to set every skill except for enchanting and smithing to 999, smithing and enchanting are left at 250 for purposes of trying to not completely bre
descriptionHtml:
Simple Batch Files to help get started.

open the console and then type in the names.

playerstatmax- uses the player.advskill command to adv every skill to 100
playerstatovermax-uses player.forceav to set every skill except for enchanting and smithing to 999, smithing and enchanting are left at 250 for purposes of trying to not completely break the game.
player.statreset-uses player.forceav to set all stats back to 0

i apologize for those who have downloaded before i fixed it. the number of times the skill was increased in the playerstatmax file apparently was too large because when i tested it myself it didnt work. [i had the file before using player.force av instead of adv av, but force av doesnt give level up bonuses]
author: Kage Kaldaka
